title: Users must be 18 years or older in order to open an account

tosdr.case: This service is only available to users of a certain age
tosdr.tldr: The Customer Agreement (EEA) states: "6.1 You must be 18 years or over. If you are an individual, you must be 18 years or older to use our Services and by opening a TransferWise Account you declare that you are 18 years or older. We may ask you at any time to show proof of your age."
